full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Defencex Project (formerly DRMIS Mod)**

**Reference Information:** 
*   Reference Number: WS3189418126
*   Solicitation Number: WS3189418126
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Publication Date: September 21, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: October 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT
*   Amendment Date: October 18, 2022

**Project Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) are seeking the modernization of enterprise resource planning (ERP) software to manage financial, materiel acquisition, materiel management, engineering, and maintenance transactions, procurement, real estate, and program/project systems. This project aims to transform and modernize business processes, enabling the transition to the SAP S/4HANA platform. The successful bidder will provide IT management services for the Defencex Project (formerly DRMIS Mod).

**Tender Information:**
*   Tender Category: Service
*   Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Participating suppliers must provide a Certificate of Origin for the goods or services.
*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Bid Requirements:**

*   All necessary supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by October 20, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT.
*   Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Department of National Defence (DND)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
*   [kenneth.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kenneth.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) [LinkedIn/Social Media Link Not Available]

**Note:**
The RFI is for a single supplier. No comments or responses can be accepted. Interested suppliers must submit their bid electronically in accordance with the ITBid documentation found in the Addenda package. Is there any alternative format?
